New Records: Ryan Helsley tied Trevor Rosenthal's franchise record with his 48th save of the season
Key Match Events: Ryan Helsley recorded a 99.6 mph four-seam fastball that induced a 107.1 mph grounder right back at him from Coloradoâ€™s Sam Hilliard, leading to a double play that capped his 48th save of the season
Post-Match Reflections: Ryan Helsley expressed that he wishes they had 20 saves and were in the playoffs, stating he doesn't care about his personal stats as long as the team wins
Miscellaneous Highlights: Helsley set club records for consecutive saves (31) and saves before the All-Star break (32)
Helsley didn't blow a save at Busch Stadium all season, going 27 for 27 at home
